nodeList.loreText: The quick hunter catches the prey
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal sabertooth cat that leaps into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The sabertooth cat counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Your sabertooth has more health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Your sabertooth has [10%] more health per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

nodeList.description: Your sabertooth deals more cold damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has an increased chance to freeze enemies.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Your sabertooth has +[40%] freeze rate multiplier per point.

Your sabertooth deals [15%] more cold damage per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.altText: {Frost Nova's} freeze chance is increased by 10% of each point attunement you have.
node.description: Your Sabertooth gains the ability to cast {Frost Nova,} a cold spell that hits all nearby enemies and has a freeze rate of 30. Frost Nova has a 10 second cooldown.
node.nodeDescription: Sabertooth gains the ability to cast a frost nova.

node.description: Your Sabertooth becomes an {Ice Tiger,} which deals additional cold damage with melee attacks, but it takes more fire damage (both multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Your sabertooth becomes an ice tiger, which deals 6 additional cold damage with melee attacks, but takes 15% more fire damage.

node.description: Your Sabertooth deals additional cold damage with spells and melee attacks.

node.description:
Your sabertooth retaliates with {Ice Vortex} when it takes 70 or more damage.

Ice Vortex is a spell that deals cold damage over time in an area, and scales with your Sabertooth's increases to cold damage, spell damage, and damage over time.

Your sabertooth's melee attacks have 40% increased stun chance and deal 40% more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.loreText: The quick hunter catches the prey
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal sabertooth cat that leaps into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The sabertooth cat counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Your Sabertooth becomes an {Ice Tiger,} which deals additional cold damage with melee attacks, but it takes more fire damage (both multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Your sabertooth becomes an ice tiger, which deals 6 additional cold damage with melee attacks, but takes 15% more fire damage.

node.description: Your Sabertooth deals additional cold damage with spells and melee attacks.

node.loreText: The quick hunter catches the prey
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal sabertooth cat that leaps into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The sabertooth cat counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

node.description: Your sabertooth deals more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Your Sabertooth deals [33%] more damage over time per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description: Your Sabertooth has a chance to cause enemies to bleed.
node.nodeDescription: Your Sabertooth has [33%] chance to inflict bleeding on hit with melee attacks

node.loreText: The quick hunter catches the prey
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal sabertooth cat that leaps into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The sabertooth cat counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.altText: {Frost Nova's} freeze chance is increased by 10% of each point attunement you have.
nodeList.description: Your Sabertooth gains the ability to cast {Frost Nova,} a cold spell that hits all nearby enemies and has a freeze rate of 30. Frost Nova has a 10 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Sabertooth gains the ability to cast a frost nova.

node.description: Your Sabertooth becomes an {Ice Tiger,} which deals additional cold damage with melee attacks, but it takes more fire damage (both multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Your sabertooth becomes an ice tiger, which deals 6 additional cold damage with melee attacks, but takes 15% more fire damage.

node.description: Your sabertooth deals more cold damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has an increased chance to freeze enemies.
node.nodeDescription:
Your sabertooth has +[40%] freeze rate multiplier per point.

Your sabertooth deals [15%] more cold damage per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description:
Your sabertooth retaliates with {Ice Vortex} when it takes 70 or more damage.

Ice Vortex is a spell that deals cold damage over time in an area, and scales with your Sabertooth's increases to cold damage, spell damage, and damage over time.
node.nodeDescription: Your sabertooth retaliates with ice vortex when it takes 70 or more damage.
